subject: College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: After a scandal that cost Tim Pernetti and Mike Rice their jobs, Julie Hermann was named Rutgers’ athletic director, making her one of the few women leading a major sports program.
snippet: After a scandal that cost Tim Pernetti and Mike Rice their jobs, Julie Hermann was named Rutgers’ athletic director, making her one of the few women leading a major sports program.
